org.svvrl.goal.core.layout

Class LayoutRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.layout.LayoutRepository

  • public class LayoutRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    This repository contains registered layout algorithms and cost functions.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

        Inserts a layout algorithm.

        id - the unique ID of the layout algorithm
        layout - the layout algorithm to be inserted

      • getLayout

        public static Layout getLayout(java.lang.String id)
        Returns the layout algorithm with a specified ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the layout algorithm
        Returns:
        the layout algorithm with ID id, null if there is no layout algorithm with such ID

      • getLayoutByName

        public static Layout getLayoutByName(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the first layout algorithm of a specified name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the layout algorithm
        Returns:
        the layout algorithm of name name, null if there is no such layout algorithm

      • getCostFunction

        public static CostFunction getCostFunction(java.lang.String id)
        Returns the cost function with a specified ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the cost function
        Returns:
        the cost function with ID id, null if there is no cost function with such ID

      • getLayouts

        public static Layout[] getLayouts()
        Returns all registered layout algorithms sorted by names.
        Returns:
        all registered layout algorithms

      • getCostFunctions

        Returns all registered cost functions sorted by names.
